this_title: VICE Special Report The Future of Work
trans_title: 恶之特别报告：未来的工作
introduction: The next Industrial Revolution is upon us, and scientists, entrepreneurs and policymakers are warning of an imminent paradigm shift in the future of work. In partnership with the Council on Foreign Relations, VICE talks to industry leaders and laborers to learn how radical developments in automation and artificial intelligence are set to change the world of work as we know it....
chinese_title: 恶之特别报告：未来的工作
foreign_title: VICE Special Report The Future of Work
